nodes.text: Krinemonen III was an oceanic moon of Krinemonen. Which was a stronghold of the Rebel Alliance.

The moon supported a ring of shipyards which manufactured cruisers, the medium-sized MC30a light cruiser and MC40a light cruiser. Ships based on designs that were modified from stolen Loronar Corporation Strike-class medium cruiser schematics. It also served as a refuge world for aquatic beings that were seeking asylum from the Imperials. In great numbers they flocked to the moon, including Priapulins and Iyra.
